name: IFTTT
short: Send Discord messages to IFTTT Webhooks
description: Relay Discord messages (with rate-limiting and optional bot filtering) to an IFTTT Webhooks endpoint.
author: Frogerman1234
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores per-guild configuration such as the IFTTT webhook URL, rate-limit settings and allowed bot ID. It stores no personal user data.
